Name: Odalys Del Socorro
description:
Odalys is a woman in a free union and has several children although only one is in her care. She has worked as a merchant for three decades.

In the past she received a loan which was fundamental to increase her commercial activities, including the production of tortillas as well as the improvement of her kitchen.

Odalys is looking for a new Kiva loan through MiCr√©dito.

Her intention is to use the loan to buy quintales of corn and to buy compost for her sugar cane crop.

This funding will translate into increased productivity of her sugar cane crop which will strengthen her agricultural business.

Her next step after obtaining this loan, is to continue working in order to get a pair of oxen.
